Detailed Description

This methods are implemented OS specific and shall be called from C++ code.

void Os::Sleep (  UINT32  timeout  )  [static]
 

The Sleep function suspends the execution of the current thread for the specified interval. When using Sleep the message handling of the whole Thread is blocked!
